Products.title: Safety Products
Products.description: Explore our comprehensive range of high-quality safety equipment

categories.head: Head Protection
categories.headDescription: Comprehensive head protection solutions including hard hats, safety helmets, and bump caps designed to protect against falling objects, electrical hazards, and impact injuries in various work environments.
categories.eyeFaceShort: Safety glasses, goggles, and face shields
categories.eyeFaceDescription: Professional eye and face protection equipment including safety glasses, goggles, face shields, and welding helmets to safeguard against chemical splashes, flying particles, and harmful radiation.
categories.hearingDescription: Advanced hearing protection devices including disposable and reusable earplugs, noise-canceling earmuffs, and communication headsets to prevent noise-induced hearing loss in loud work environments.
categories.respiratoryDescription: High-quality respiratory protection equipment including N95 masks, half-face and full-face respirators, and self-contained breathing apparatus for protection against airborne contaminants and toxic gases.
categories.handDescription: Specialized hand protection solutions including cut-resistant gloves, chemical-resistant gloves, heat-resistant gloves, and general-purpose work gloves for various industrial applications.
categories.bodyDescription: Complete body protection clothing including coveralls, chemical suits, high-visibility vests, flame-resistant clothing, and protective aprons designed for specific workplace hazards.
categories.footDescription: Professional safety footwear including steel-toe boots, slip-resistant shoes, electrical hazard boots, and chemical-resistant boots to protect feet from various workplace hazards.
categories.gasDetectorsDescription: Advanced gas detection and monitoring systems including portable gas detectors, fixed gas monitoring systems, and personal gas monitors for early detection of hazardous gases and vapors.

story.title: Our Story
content: Founded in 2008, MELCO was established with a singular mission: to enhance workplace safety across Saudi Arabia. We recognized a critical need for reliable, high-quality safety equipment and expert guidance in a rapidly industrializing region.

Over the past 15 years, we have grown from a specialized supplier into a comprehensive safety solutions provider. Our journey has been marked by a relentless commitment to quality, strategic partnerships with world-renowned manufacturers, and a deep understanding of our clients' operational challenges.

Today, MELCO is a trusted partner to industry leaders in oil & gas, construction, manufacturing, and beyond. We are proud to have played a role in protecting thousands of workers and contributing to a culture of safety in the Kingdom and the wider region.
